00041 ElementPMeanP::ElementPMeanP( double p, ElemSampleQM* metric )
00042     : PMeanPMetric( p ), 
00043       mMetric(metric)
00044     {}
00045     
00046 ElementPMeanP::~ElementPMeanP() {}

00048 std::string ElementPMeanP::get_name() const
00049 {
00050   std::string result("ElementPMeanP(");
00051   result += mMetric->get_name();
00052   result += ")";
00053   return result;
00054 }

00057 int ElementPMeanP::get_negate_flag() const
00058 {
00059   return get_quality_metric()->get_negate_flag();
00060 }
00061 
00062 bool ElementPMeanP::evaluate( PatchData& pd, 
00063                               size_t handle, 
00064                               double& value, 
00065                               MsqError& err )
00066 {
00067   ElemSampleQM* qm = get_quality_metric();
00068   mHandles.clear();
00069   qm->get_element_evaluations( pd, handle, mHandles, err ); MSQ_ERRFALSE(err);
00070   bool result = average( pd, qm, mHandles, value, err );
00071   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && result;
00072 }
00073 
00074 bool ElementPMeanP::evaluate_with_gradient( PatchData& pd, 
00075                                             size_t handle, 
00076                                             double& value, 
00077                                             std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00078                                             std::vector<Vector3D>& gradient,
00079                                             MsqError& err )
00080 {
00081   ElemSampleQM* qm = get_quality_metric();
00082   mHandles.clear();
00083   qm->get_element_evaluations( pd, handle, mHandles, err ); MSQ_ERRFALSE(err);
00084   bool result = average_with_gradient( pd, qm, mHandles, value, indices, gradient, err );
00085   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && result;
00086 }

00088 bool ElementPMeanP::evaluate_with_Hessian( PatchData& pd, 
00089                           size_t handle, 
00090                           double& value, 
00091                           std::vector<size_t>& indices,

00099   bool result = average_with_Hessian( pd, qm, mHandles, value, indices, gradient, Hessian, err );
00100   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && result;
00101 }

00103 bool ElementPMeanP::evaluate_with_Hessian_diagonal( PatchData& pd, 
00104                           size_t handle, 
00105                           double& value, 
00106                           std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00107                           std::vector<Vector3D>& gradient,
00108                           std::vector<SymMatrix3D>& diagonal,
00109                           MsqError& err )
00110 {
00111   ElemSampleQM* qm = get_quality_metric();
00112   mHandles.clear();
00113   qm->get_element_evaluations( pd, handle, mHandles, err ); MSQ_ERRFALSE(err);
00114   bool result = average_with_Hessian_diagonal( pd, qm, mHandles, value, indices, gradient, diagonal, err );
00115   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && result;
